data.title: Yearly art festival was terrific
data.text: Another great variety of art and crafts to admire and purchase.  As a visitor to the town, I was highly impressed with the center's production.

data.title: Hidden Gem
data.text:
The Lakeville Area Arts Center building is located in the former location of All Saints Catholic Church.  It is a beautiful building, which has been refurbished very well.  The center hosts many different occasions, providing a stage, main floor and balcony.  A large meeting space is located in the lower level.  Restrooms have been redesigned and offer facilities for the handicapped.  

There are a variety if entertainment options available, at reasonable prices (some free!)  The "One Book, One Lakeville" event was held recently, with tickets offered at no charge, including a complimentary snack offering during intermission.  

Great local venue.

data.title: "On Golden Pond"
data.text: First time 4 couples met there for the play & it was excellent! What a super job Lakeville's Community Theatre actors have done! The venue is special too! The old Catholic Church has been converted to a stage and theater seats! What an awesome entry area! Beautifully done! Would surely attend again!

data.title: Inexpensive Entertainment for a Great Show!
data.text: Wonderful venue for plays and other entertaining shows!! Seating Excellent, sound, excellent, wonderful atmosphere!

data.title: Great Concert Venue
data.text: Great small venue! They serve wine and beer during concerts! Have a bite to eat across the street first.

data.title: Nice place
data.text: Nice place but bit boring for kids. I wish there was more for the kids. Maybe i will go back without the kids.

data.title: Hometown Theater & Entertainment
data.text: Fantastic venue for all their events. A true value for the cost. It's also a great opportunity  to see local talent. Great way to support our local community and many artists that have a passion to perform.

data.title: Wonderful Shows offered year round
data.text: Get your hands on the yearly brochure that lays out all the offerings.  Music, theatre, dances, special events...

data.title: Lakeville Area Art Center
data.text: A delight in a growing community which continues to offer many artistic experiences which include gallery exhibits of artists works and a highly regarded art festival which is held every September.  A lovely stone building on the main street of downtown Lakeville which hosts a performing arts series throughout the year.  The Center also hosts the "Taste of Lakeville" sponsored by the Lakeville Rotary, an event which has been a very successful fundraiser and social event.  Enjoy another fun fundraising event "Beer, Brats and Bingo" on the Arts Center grounds sponsored by the Lions Club during the annual Pan-O-Prog summer 4th of July celebration.  The Lakeville Area Arts Center art studio is dedicated to the creative spirit fostering an environment that enhances individual expression and develops self esteem.  A large variety of classes and workshops are available for both youth and adults including pottery, painting, photography, drawing, jewelry making and drama.  It is the perfect place to shop for one-of-a-kind fine art.  There is always something new and unique to see.  I have visited many times and enjoy all their events!

data.title: Lakeville's Gem
data.text:
My husband and I have been here several times in the past year.  Our first experience was a dueling piano comedy routine, Deuces Wild, Dueling Pianos.  The performance was delightful!  The friends we went with that night suggested the Nat King Cole tribute the following month because we had had so much fun the first time there.  It was another great evening!  The stadium seating ensures a good view from anywhere in the theater.  The acoustics were great as well.
Lakevilee Area Art Center provides classes, a local gallery for artists, a theater for local and regional groups to perform, special events  and a place in our community for people to enjoy the arts.  It has been a great addition to the community and a great place to visit!  Check out their website for events you and your family can enjoy while in the area.
